this project was delivered.

The external/riscv-isa-sim folder (Spike RISC-V Simulator), if present, is held
under its own licensing terms. See external/riscv-isa-sim/LICENSE.

The include/refsidrv and source/refsidrv folders contain files derived from the
Spike RISC-V Simulator project referred to above and can be identified by the
presence of a 'See LICENSE.spike for license details.' comment at the top of the
relevant files. These files are held under their own licensing terms,
LICENSE.spike.
